contest-event.event-date:
April 4, 1947 D NSW State Championships (A Grade)
NSW State Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest NSW State Championships nsw-state-championships-a-grade
Australia
A Grade
Contest cancelled due to a paucity of entries Though there were 70 bands registered with the Association and that a record 500 pounds ($1000) prize money on offer only 7 bands entered viz St.John Ambulance Brigade (only "A" grade entry) , Kogarah Municipal, St.George District, Glebe District Silver, Wollongong Steelworks, Cowra District & Katoomba Juniors provided entries for grades "A," "B" "C" "D" and Junior .
Jan. 8, 2021, 12:18 a.m. Jan. 29, 2021, 3:49 a.m.
